tents behind me and the police

we understand the woman who was killed
here at the scene that her body was

we now know that it was two men and

well obviously this police inquired a

counterterrorism officers are also
involved and there was also that warning
from assistant mark rolling who gave
quite an unusual press conference made a
press statement in the middle of the
night that londoners would see more
police officers on the streets today and
that some of those officers would be
armed he said that was a precaution that
the people of London should remain calm
vigilant and alert and if they saw
anything to report it to the police in
the normal way
